sentences.english: Compared with Nan dynasties, the works of Sao Style have its own characteristic, though its quantity is not too large.
sentences.chinese: 北朝騷體之作數量不多，但與南朝相比自有其特色。

sentences.english: In the northern and southern dynasties, appear miscellaneous cast.
In the history of ancient China's social and national development, the period of the 4th-6th centuries was important.
sentences.chinese: 北朝是中國古代社會和民族發展史上的重要階段。

sentences.english: Thank you North Korea. This might start WW3.
sentences.chinese: 感謝北朝鮮，這可能會引發第三次世界大戰。

sentences.english: North Korea is not going to start bombing anybody.
sentences.chinese: 北朝鮮沒有核打擊任何國家的想法。

sentences.english: You can forget about China ever allying with US against North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 如果美國支持臺灣，中國就會支持北朝鮮。

sentences.english: The forth chapter discusses the development and transformation of the imitating ancient poetry in Wei, Jin and Northern & Southern dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第四章論述魏晉南北朝擬“古詩”的發展流變。

sentences.english: North Korea threatened to shoot at the speakers earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 北朝鮮今年早些時候威脅要射殺這些喊話者。

sentences.english: The third part focused on discussing the Northern and Southern Buddhism's influence on the essay.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要討論南北朝時期佛教對論說文的影響。

sentences.english: Around 15000 NTD, all necessary household appliances, an air conditioner, and Northern-Southern exposure would be best.
sentences.chinese: 一萬五左右，家電齊全，有冷氣，最好是座北朝南的。

sentences.english: The flowerpots should be laid facing south, and it may prevent the direct invasion of the cold current.
sentences.chinese: 蘭盆放置最好坐北朝南，可以防止寒流的直接侵入。

sentences.english: North Korean commandos are not expected to survive such attacks.
sentences.chinese: 此類攻擊後，北朝鮮突擊隊預計不會有人活着。

sentences.english: The system of village started in the Wei, Jin, and Southern and Northern dynasties was a great progress of local primary-level organizations.
sentences.chinese: 魏晉南北朝時代村的出現是地方基層組織的一大變革。

sentences.english: They walked north on Wabash to Adams Street and then west.
sentences.chinese: 他們沿華拔士街往北朝亞當街走去，然後轉彎朝西走。

sentences.english: Weijin and Northern and Southern Dynasties is the prosperous period of the patriarchal clan in the Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 魏晉南北朝時期是中國歷史上宗族強盛的時期。

sentences.english: In the Northern Dynasty, various nations were related through marriage frequently and the wedding custom are integrated with each other.
sentences.chinese: 北朝時期，各民族間的通婚頻繁，婚禮習俗彼此融合。
